response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product not only embodies our brand's commitment to excellence but also offers unique features tailored to enhance your specific needs. Given its exceptional capabilities and the time, effort, and resources invested into its development, we believe it's valued at more than $12,000. Considering the potential benefits it could bring to you, I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at this exclusive offer price of $15,000. I'm confident that once you experience its capabilities, you'll find it to be an invaluable asset. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 15000}
